name: ai-recommender-system
description: Link-Based AI Recommender System using GenAI + Data Science

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:ai"
scripts.install: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.setup:conda: conda create -n ai-recommender python=3.10 -y && conda activate ai-recommender && cd ai-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
